channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Forget the ‘Magnificent Seven’ — these 7 cheap tech and AI stocks are better buys right now
item.description: This mutual-fund manager stays calm through uncertainty — and significantly outperforms the stock market.

item.title: Why Republicans are defending this lucrative Medicaid scam
item.description: Guess who’s paying for the costs of hospitals and nursing homes in red states?

item.title: Trump administration eyes cuts to student-loan forgiveness for public servants
item.description: The proposed regulatory text from the Education Department would ban certain employers from being eligible for Public Service Loan Forgiveness.

item.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum or $355 a month for life?
item.description: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years.”

item.title: Robinhood’s Vlad Tenev has led a trading revolution to become a new Wall Street power
item.description: Backed by an army of retail traders, Vlad Tenev is shaking up the financial order.

item.title: These overbought stocks need to cool off as the market trades back at record highs
item.description: Stocks that have soared recently could see a pullback in the coming weeks.

item.title: Gabelli Funds highlights the AI stocks to buy as craze continues
item.description: Early signs show investors have yet to grasp the full potential of generative AI, said John Belton, portfolio manager at Gabelli Funds.

item.title: Bank of America says buy these five stocks that are set to rally in the second half
item.description: Bank of America named five stocks worth buying in the second half.

item.title: Dan Niles says investors have to 'forget about' valuations and names his favorite tech stocks
item.description: The money manager's comments come as the market rallies to record highs.

item.title: Coinbase is the best-performing stock in the S&P 500 in June, and may have even more room to run
item.description: Coinbase is on pace for its third straight monthly gain, the first time it's put together a three-month rally since the end of 2023.
